snippet: Roger Federer made the most of Kei Nishikori’s erratic play to secure a 6-3, 6-2 victory and move closer to a semifinal spot.
abstract: Roger Federer defeats Kei Nishikori, moving closer to semifinals at ATP Finals in London.
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer made the most of Kei Nishikori’s erratic play to secure a 6-3, 6-2 victory and move closer to a semifinal spot.

headline.main: Federer Tops Nishikori at ATP Finals
